name: HENTAISLAND: Lost Pantsu
description:
HENTAISLAND: Lost Pantsu-a dynamic shooting game in the open world, spend your time on an amazing sunny island, in the company of cute girls. At your disposal are various weapons, your goal is to collect all the lost pantsu. You can do it!

Main Features


  • Sunny tropical island
  • Various weapons and dangerous enemies
  • Easy and convenient operation
  • Cute anime girls!
